ingredients.item: 50g essential Frozen Pitted Dark Sweet Cherries, defrosted overnight
2 tbsp Waitrose & Partners No.1 Dark Chocolate & Sour Cherry Granola (optional)

instructions.step: Mix the grated apple, oats and almond unsweetened drink together in a small bowl. Cover and leave in
In the morning, fold in the defrosted cherries and the yogurt alternative. Serve, topped with granola if using.
